about_the_game:
Netdreams Sudoku is a classic popular number game to train your mind. The Netdreams team puts at your disposal the video game that we play in the office where you can play classic sudoku with different difficulties. Play sudoku daily and spend hours facing the video game levels: easy, normal, difficult and our sudoku for experts.

Netdreams Sudoku is a mathematical puzzle and logic problem video game that involves placing numbers from 1 to 9 on blank squares of a large grid, usually 81 squares, subdivided into smaller grids of 9 squares (three by each side), with the objective that no number is repeated in each row, each column or each 3 x 3 box. The difficulty of the sudoku game is defined by the number of grids completed at the beginning of each game.

Netdreams Sudoku is designed for all players. Beginners can learn to play classic sudoku. The sudoku expert mode is ideal for the most experienced players who will face great challenges in the thousands of sudoku boards that we put at your disposal.

Use all the tools that Netdreams Sudoku provides you: you can undo the numbers in the wrong boxes, delete numbers, with the Note option, you can write in a box the probable numbers that that box may have on the sudoku board and if you don't know how complete the sudoku support yourself with the clues from Netdreams Sudoku so you can complete your sudoku game.

Get the Netdreams Sudoku game from Steam and challenge yourself with sudoku at different difficulty levels. Improve your concentration and intellectual capacity by completing a game daily in Netdreams Sudoku!

name: Netdreams Sudoku

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Netdreams Sudoku is the classic sudoku game that offers you many hours of entertainment playing between different levels of difficulty, from beginner to expert, Netdreams Sudoku is the perfect game for all players.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal
